title: Electronic Brainwashing: Cambridge Analytica's Sinister Facebook Strategy | Matt Damon & Gary White
itunes:title: Electronic Brainwashing: Cambridge Analytica's Sinister Facebook Strategy | Matt Damon & Gary White
description:
Ben Carson sleepily throws his wife under the bus, Trevor breaks down the Cambridge Analytica scandal, and Matt Damon and Gary White discuss Water.org and WaterEquity.
